title: Why do ADCS still complain about dying fast?
body: I don't get it. I really don't. The point of the role is to be a glass cannon. Emphasis on glass. If ADCs were tanky, they'd be impossible to ever shut down. I get it, being one-shot by an assassin isn't fun, but hell, that's what their job is to do to you. You can't seriously expect to be the best at everything. That isn't fair for the other roles.
